select GetNumber, Status, Id as PlanId, Type, CouponNumber, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),EndTime,120) as EndTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),StartTime,120) as StartTime, CouponsType, TermMoney, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CreatTime,120) as CreatTime, Mark, CouponsMoney from CouponsPlan where IsDelete=2
Id = #Id#
CouponsType = #CouponsType#
Status = #Status#
Type = #Type#
StartTime >= #StartTime#
EndTime <= #EndTime#
order by CreatTime asc
offset #start# rows fetch next #rows# rows only

select count(*) from CouponsPlan where IsDelete=2
Id = #Id#
CouponsType = #CouponsType#
Status = #Status#
Type = #Type#
StartTime >= #StartTime#
EndTime <= #EndTime#
statements.update:
update CouponsPlan set IsDelete = 2
,CouponsMoney=#CouponsMoney#
,StartTime=#StartTime#
,EndTime=#EndTime#
,Mark=#Mark#
,Type=#Type#
,CouponNumber=#CouponNumber#
,GetNumber=#GetNumber#
,CouponsType=#CouponsType#
,Status=#Status#
where Id=#id#
update CouponsPlan set IsDelete = 1 where Id=#id#
